content.en: Wireless localization algorithms: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the accuracy of location in wireless communication systems, indoor localization in wireless networks, and localization of sensor nodes in wireless sensor networks. They have been using various algorithms such as weighted least-squares support vector machine, discriminatively regularized least square classifier, and probabilistic support vector machine-based methods to achieve these improvements. These algorithms attribute agency to themselves in achieving accurate and efficient localization in different environments.
content.da: Trådløse lokaliseringsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre nøjagtigheden af lokalisering i trådløse kommunikationssystemer, indendørs lokalisering i trådløse netværk og lokalisering af sensornoder i trådløse sensornetværk. De har benyttet sig af forskellige algoritmer såsom vægtet mindste kvadraters support vector machine, diskriminativt reguleret mindste kvadrats klassifikator og probabilistiske support vector machine-baserede metoder for at opnå disse forbedringer. Disse algoritmer tilskriver sig selv handlekraft i at opnå præcis og effektiv lokalisering i forskellige miljøer.
